title: [Extension Proposal] Java Money

labels.name: area/quarkiverse
labels.description: This issue/PR is part of the Quarkiverse organization

body:
### Description

I would like to create an extension for the Java Money RI Moneta library so that it can be used seamlessly in Quarkus.

### Repository name

quarkus-moneta

### Short description

Quarkus JSR 354 Java Money Extension

### Repository Homepage URL

https://quarkiverse.github.io/quarkiverse-docs/<REPOSITORY_NAME>/dev/

### Repository Topics

- quarkus-extension
- javamoney
- jsr354
- currency


### Team Members

- andlinger
- holzleitner

### GitHub Applications?
